sections.title: Introduction & Role Context
sections.goal: Establish participant backgrounds, clarify their connection to Nimbus Observability and initial responsibilities.
sample_questions: Can you outline your role in the Nimbus Observability project and your primary responsibilities?
How does your day-to-day work intersect with the stated scope of OpenTelemetry pipelines and SLOs?
What were the initial objectives you were given when joining this phase of the project?

sections.title: Architecture & Pipelines
sections.goal: Understand the technical architecture and operational boundaries of the observability pipelines.
sample_questions: Could you walk me through the current architecture of the OpenTelemetry pipeline in Nimbus?
How are trace sampling strategies, as per RFC-1114, applied in the build phase?
Which upstream and downstream systems does the observability pipeline integrate with?

sections.title: SLO Definition & Enforcement
sections.goal: Delve into how SLOs are defined, monitored, and enforced, and their impact on incident management.
sample_questions: What SLOs are currently in place for Nimbus and how were they determined?
How do you ensure alignment between SLOs and the SLA commitments made to customers?
Can you describe a scenario where an SLO breach triggered an incident response?

sections.title: Incident Analytics & Runbooks
sections.goal: Explore the runbook-driven approach to handling incidents and the analytics used to improve reliability.
sample_questions: How is RB-OBS-033 Alert Fatigue Tuning applied in your incident response process?
Could you share an example where incident analytics led to a change in alerting thresholds?
What are the unwritten heuristics you and your team follow beyond formal runbooks?

sections.title: UX Considerations in Observability
sections.goal: Investigate how UX design impacts observability tools, dashboards, and developer adoption.
sample_questions: From a UX perspective, how do you design dashboards to minimize cognitive load during incidents?
What accessibility guidelines are applied to observability interfaces?
How do you balance detailed telemetry data with visual clarity?

sections.title: Cross-Project Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify interdependencies with other Novereon projects and how they influence observability design.
sample_questions: Which other projectsâ€™ telemetry data feed into Nimbus and how do you ensure compatibility?
How do changes in Atlas Mobile or Orion Edge Gateway affect the observability pipeline?
Can you describe a case where a policy like POL-SEC-001 influenced your observability design?

sections.title: Tradeoffs, Risks & Future Roadmap
sections.goal: Discuss decisions, tradeoffs, and risks with supporting evidence from past tickets, RFCs, and runbooks.
sample_questions: What tradeoffs have you made between high-fidelity telemetry and system performance?
Can you reference a ticket or RFC that documents a significant risk mitigation in Nimbus?
Looking ahead, what are the key risks for Nimbus and how will you address them?
